phase3.gui.MainShell



class MainShell: org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell.Shell;
The MainShell class is the Shell window that runs the entire program.

Authors:
Zachery Burris (zburris@uncc.edu) and Richard Voelker (rvoelker@uncc.edu)

Date:
April 9, 2014

this(Display display);
Create, setup, and display the MainShell.

Params:
Display display The display to draw the Shell from.
